definition: To grant permission for an action or event to occur, typically in a formal or official context. It is commonly used in legal, administrative, or regulatory contexts to indicate the authorization or approval of something.

examples.german: Ich lasse dich in mein Haus zulassen.
examples.english: I allow you to enter my house.

examples.german: Der Arzt wird die Behandlung zulassen.
examples.english: The doctor will allow the treatment.

examples.german: Bitte lassen Sie mich in Ruhe zulassen.
examples.english: Please allow me to be alone.

examples.german: Die Sicherheitskontrolle wird keine Waffen zulassen.
examples.english: The security check will not allow weapons.
